comment: all rooftop capacities are in GWp for photovoltaic systems, to archieve a correct representation of solar thermal rooftop systems their efficiency  is used to scale up their output
for CHP ccgtPlants two modes are assumed, "moreHeat" as a lower overall efficiency, but a smaller smaller electricity share

since excess heat is also an output from methanation this is the Carnot efficiencies, the effiency relating only to synthetic gas is obtained via combination with the ratio of genration outputs

synthGas ratio of output, the remaining share is excess heat, so increasing value implies increase in "efficiency"
